overview: On 28th April, one day before 'Zeit'; the eighth studio album by the artist Rammstein is released, fans of the internationally acclaimed German band will have the exclusive opportunity to see, hear and experience the album ofc11 new songs as a premiere in spectacular Dolby Atmos! Three years ago, its untitled predecessor reached No. 1 in the music charts of 14 countries as well as a Top 10 entry in the US (a first for Rammstein)! For one night only in selected cinemas worldwide!
title: Rammstein: Zeit - The ATMOS Experience
